featuredTrack.title: Pretty Damaged
featuredTrack.description: Today's featured track celibrates scars and what they represent.

dailyQuote.text: Don't fix me, don't heal me
dailyQuote.author: Vesper Sinclair

news.title: Album Now Streaming Everywhere
news.content: Our debut album 'Euphoric Wreckage' is now available on all major streaming platforms. 12 tracks of dark euphoric breakbeat ready for your ears.

news.title: New Visuals Released
news.content: Check out our latest Spotify Canvas videos featuring each band member. Immersive visuals to match the sonic intensity.

news.title: Euphoric Wreckage Goes Live
news.content: Welcome to our digital home. Where destruction meets joy. Where broken things become beautiful.
